definition.text: If you have no tokens in your Governance Address, then you have zero Token Power! But don't worry! We'll work something out!

paragraphs.text: Whether you have any Token Power or not, notice that there is now 0% of Token Power going into the Onboarding Programs and 100% going into the Community Building Programs! Floodgates closed, the flow goes elsewhere! You can play with percentages too!

Now, here's the good news... Because chances are that you have no Token Power to fulfill the third requirement to participate in the Community Building Programs, we are going to delegate some power to all User Profiles in this release! Well take care of that, so forget about it!
